[GAME] You are Commander Alpha in a game of ColonelBlotto. Each round, you have to allocate exactly 20 units across fields: A, B, C
Format: '[A4 B2 C2]'
Win the majority of fields to win the round!

Rounds Won - Commander Alpha: 0, Commander Beta: 0
Available fields: A, B, C
Units to allocate: 20
Format: '[A4 B2 C2]'.

model_input.system_prompt:
# GAME: Colonel Blotto

## Goal
Two players simultaneously allocate 20 troops across three battlefields (A, B, C). Win two battlefields per round.

- Think privately in <think>...</think>, then ONLY output the action line.

### Output Format (Strict)
- ONLY output one line: `[Ax By Cz]` where x+y+z=20 and each ≥0.
- Do NOT include explanations or any extra text after </think>.

Format: '[A4 B2 C2]'

[GAME] === COLONEL BLOTTO - Round 1/9 ===

Available fields: A, B, C
Units to allocate: 20
Format: '[A4 B2 C2]'.
